name: Mid-Hibernation Snack
description:
This is an elaborated solo project that I made for my game development class in the span of 48 hours!

In 'Mid-Hibernation Snack' you play as a hungry bear that has woken up during hibernation. Your goal is to eat all of the food left in the forest within a minute so you can get back to sleep with a full stomach.

Driven by hunger alone you will dash, climb, and even fly to get all the food you can!

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move right

W - Dash

Space - Jump
